name: 謝東儒
objective: 使學生熟悉計算機圖學的基本原理、方法、及工具，內容包括： (1) 二維及三維幾何圖形之產生  (2) 幾何圖形之轉換 (3) 隱藏面及隱藏線之處理 (4) 色彩原理 (5) 光影及暗影技術 (6) 粒子系統 (7) 電腦動畫 (8) CUDA (9) PhysX 技術。學生將需撰寫OpenGL電腦繪圖程式。
schedule:
1  Syllabus, From Vertices to Fragments
2  Graphics Systems and Models
3  Graphics Programming
4  Input and Interaction
5  Geometric Objects and Transformation
6  Viewing and Projections
7  Lighting and Shading
8  Discrete Techniques, Texture Mapping
9  Midterm
10 Marching Cubes
11 Modeling, Scene Graph; Curves & Surfaces
12 Advanced Rendering, Ray Tracing
13 Programmable Shaders
14 OpenGL Shading Language (GLSL)
15 Compute Unified Device Architecture (CUDA)
16 Parallel Visualization
17 Scientific Visualization  project
18 Final Project Presentation
materials:
Textbook: Edward Angel, Interactive Computer Graphics: A Top-Down Approach using OpenGL (5th Edition), Addison Wesley, 2008.
Reference Book: OpenGL Programming Guide: The Official Guide to Learning OpenGL, Version 2.1 (6th Edition), Addison Wesley, 2006. http://www.opengl.org/documentation/red_book/
